tool_description: Postmark helps deliver and track transactional emails for web applications.
name: Postmark
title: Postmark

api_list.name: RotateDKIMKeys
api_list.description: Creates a new DKIM key to replace your current key. Until the new DNS entries are confirmed, the pending values will be in DKIMPendingHost and DKIMPendingTextValue fields. After the new DKIM value is verified in DNS, the pending values will migrate to DKIMTextValue and DKIMPendingTextValue and Postmark will begin to sign emails with the new DKIM key.

required_parameters.name: accountToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires account level privileges. Only accessible by the account owner, this token can be found on the Account tab of your Postmark account.

required_parameters.name: domainId
required_parameters.description: Id of the domain.

api_list.name: VerifySpfRecord
api_list.description: Will query DNS for your domain and attempt to verify the SPF record contains the information for Postmark's servers.

required_parameters.name: domainId
required_parameters.description: Id of the domain.

required_parameters.name: accountToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires account level privileges. Only accessible by the account owner, this token can be found on the Account tab of your Postmark account.

api_list.name: activateBounce

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: bounceId
required_parameters.description: Id of bounce.

api_list.name: bypassBlockedInboundMessage
api_list.description: Bypass rules for a blocked inbound message.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: messageId
required_parameters.description: Id of the message.

api_list.name: createDomain

required_parameters.name: accountToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires account level privileges. Only accessible by the account owner, this token can be found on the Account tab of your Postmark account.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Domain name.

optional_parameters.name: returnPathDomain
optional_parameters.description: A custom value for the Return-Path domain. It is an optional field, but it must be a subdomain of your From Email domain and must have a CNAME record that points to pm.mtasv.net. For more information about this field, please see readme.

api_list.name: createInboundRuleTrigger

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: rule
required_parameters.description: Email address (or domain) that you would like to block from sending.

api_list.name: createServerForAccount

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of server.

required_parameters.name: accountToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires account level privileges. Only accessible by the account owner, this token can be found on the Account tab of your Postmark account.

optional_parameters.name: inboundSpamThreshold
optional_parameters.description: The maximum spam score for an inbound message before it's blocked.

optional_parameters.name: openHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time an open event occurs.

optional_parameters.name: clickHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to when a unique click event occurs.

optional_parameters.name: smtpApiActivated
optional_parameters.description: Specifies whether or not SMTP is enabled on this server.

optional_parameters.name: deliveryHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time email is delivered.

optional_parameters.name: trackOpens
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if all emails being sent through this server have open tracking enabled.

optional_parameters.name: bounceHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time a bounce event occurs.

optional_parameters.name: postFirstOpenOnly
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, only the first open by a particular recipient will initiate the open webhook. Any subsequent opens of the same email by the same recipient will not initiate the webhook.

optional_parameters.name: rawEmailEnabled
optional_parameters.description: Enable raw email to be sent with inbound.

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: Color of the server in the rack screen.

optional_parameters.name: includeBounceContentInHook
optional_parameters.description: Include bounce content in webhook.

optional_parameters.name: trackLinks
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if all emails being sent through this server should have link tracking enabled for links in their HTML or Text bodies.

optional_parameters.name: inboundDomain
optional_parameters.description: Inbound domain for MX setup.

optional_parameters.name: inboundHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time an inbound event occurs.

api_list.name: createSignature

required_parameters.name: accountToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires account level privileges. Only accessible by the account owner, this token can be found on the Account tab of your Postmark account.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: From name associated with sender signature.

required_parameters.name: fromEmail
required_parameters.description: From email associated with sender signature.

optional_parameters.name: returnPathDomain
optional_parameters.description: A custom value for the Return-Path domain. It is an optional field, but it must be a subdomain of your From Email domain and must have a CNAME record that points to pm.mtasv.net. For more information about this field, please see readme.

optional_parameters.name: replyToEmail
optional_parameters.description: Override for reply-to address.

api_list.name: createTemplate

required_parameters.name: subject
required_parameters.description: The content to use for the Subject when this template is used to send email. See readme for more information.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of template.

optional_parameters.name: htmlBody
optional_parameters.description: The content to use for the TextBody when this template is used to send email. Required if textBody is not specified.  See readme for more information.

optional_parameters.name: textBody
optional_parameters.description: The content to use for the HtmlBody when this template is used to send email. Required if htmlBody is not specified. See readme for more information.

api_list.name: createTriggerForTag
api_list.description: Tags triggers let you activate special behavior when you send messages with a certain tag.

required_parameters.name: matchName
required_parameters.description: Name of the tag that will activate this trigger.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

optional_parameters.name: trackOpens
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if this trigger activates open tracking.

api_list.name: getBounceCounts
api_list.description: Gets total counts of emails you’ve sent out that have been returned as bounced.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

optional_parameters.name: fromDate
optional_parameters.description: Filter stats starting from the date specified (inclusive). e.g. 2014-01-01

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: Filter by tag.

optional_parameters.name: toDate
optional_parameters.description: Filter stats up to the date specified (inclusive). e.g. 2014-02-01

required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

api_list.name: getBouncedTags
api_list.description: Get an array of tags that have generated bounces for a given server.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

api_list.name: getBounces
api_list.description: Lets you access all reports regarding your bounces for a specific server.

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: Number of bounces to return per request. Max 500.

required_parameters.name: offset
required_parameters.description: Number of bounces to skip.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

optional_parameters.name: inactive
optional_parameters.description: Filter by emails that were deactivated by Postmark due to the bounce. Set to true or false. If this isn’t specified it will return both active and inactive.

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: Filter by tag.

optional_parameters.name: fromDate
optional_parameters.description: Filter messages starting from the date specified (inclusive). e.g. 2014-02-01

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Bounce types.See more in readme.

optional_parameters.name: emailFilter
optional_parameters.description: Filter by email address.

optional_parameters.name: toDate
optional_parameters.description: Filter messages up to the date specified (inclusive). e.g. 2014-02-01

optional_parameters.name: messageID
optional_parameters.description: Filter by messageID.

api_list.name: getBrowserPlatformUsage
api_list.description: Gets an overview of the browser platforms used to open your emails. This is only recorded when Link Tracking is enabled for that email.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: Filter by tag.

optional_parameters.name: toDate
optional_parameters.description: Filter stats up to the date specified (inclusive). e.g. 2014-02-01

api_list.name: getClickForMessage

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: Number of message opens to return per request. Max 500.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: offset
required_parameters.description: Number of messages to skip.

optional_parameters.name: clientFamily
optional_parameters.description: Filter by client family, i.e. OS X, Chrome.

optional_parameters.name: recipient
optional_parameters.description: Filter by To, Cc, Bcc.

optional_parameters.name: clientName
optional_parameters.description: Filter by client name, i.e. Outlook, Gmail.

optional_parameters.name: osFamily
optional_parameters.description: Filter by kind of OS used without specific version, i.e. OS X, Windows.

optional_parameters.name: platform
optional_parameters.description: Filter by platform, i.e. webmail, desktop, mobile.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: Filter by full name of city messages were opened in, i.e. Minneapolis, Philadelphia.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: Filter by full name of region messages were opened in, i.e. Moscow, New York.

optional_parameters.name: osName
optional_parameters.description: Filter by full OS name and specific version, i.e. OS X 10.9 Mavericks, Windows 7.

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: Filter by tag.

optional_parameters.name: osCompany
optional_parameters.description: Filter by company which produced the OS, i.e. Apple Computer, Inc., Microsoft Corporation.

optional_parameters.name: clientCompany
optional_parameters.description: Filter by company, i.e. Microsoft, Apple, Google.

api_list.name: getEmailReadTimes
api_list.description: Gets the length of time that recipients read emails along with counts for each time. This is only recorded when open tracking is enabled for that email. Read time tracking stops at 20 seconds, so any read times above that will appear in the 20s+ field.

optional_parameters.description: Filter by full name of city messages were opened in, i.e. Minneapolis, Philadelphia.

optional_parameters.name: clientFamily
optional_parameters.description: Filter by client family, i.e. OS X, Chrome.

optional_parameters.name: osFamily
optional_parameters.description: Filter by kind of OS used without specific version, i.e. OS X, Windows.

optional_parameters.name: clientName
optional_parameters.description: Filter by client name, i.e. Outlook, Gmail.

optional_parameters.name: platform
optional_parameters.description: Filter by platform, i.e. webmail, desktop, mobile.

optional_parameters.name: osCompany
optional_parameters.description: Filter by company which produced the OS, i.e. Apple Computer, Inc., Microsoft Corporation.

optional_parameters.name: osName
optional_parameters.description: Filter by full OS name and specific version, i.e. OS X 10.9 Mavericks, Windows 7.

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: Filter by tag.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: Filter by full name of region messages were opened in, i.e. Moscow, New York.

optional_parameters.name: clientCompany
optional_parameters.description: Filter by company, i.e. Microsoft, Apple, Google.

api_list.name: openSingleMessage

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: Number of message opens to return per request. Max 500.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: messageId
required_parameters.description: Id of the message.

required_parameters.name: offset
required_parameters.description: Number of messages to skip

api_list.name: processFailedInboundMessage
api_list.description: Retry a failed inbound message for processing.

required_parameters.name: messageId
required_parameters.description: Id of the message.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

api_list.name: resendConfirmation

required_parameters.name: signatureId
required_parameters.description: Id of the signature.

required_parameters.name: accountToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires account level privileges. Only accessible by the account owner, this token can be found on the Account tab of your Postmark account.

api_list.name: sendEmail
api_list.description: Send single email.This endpoint is solely responsible for sending emails with Postmark through a specific server.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma separated. Max 50.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: The sender email address. Must have a registered and confirmed Sender Signature.

optional_parameters.name: BccRecipientEmailAddress
optional_parameters.description: Bcc recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma separated. Max 50.

optional_parameters.name: replyTo
optional_parameters.description: Reply To override email address. Defaults to the Reply To set in the sender signature.

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: Email tag that allows you to categorize outgoing emails and get detailed statistics.

optional_parameters.name: textBody
optional_parameters.description: If no HtmlBody specified Plain text email message.

optional_parameters.name: subject
optional_parameters.description: Email subject.

optional_parameters.name: textBody
optional_parameters.description: If no HtmlBody specified Plain text email message.

optional_parameters.name: htmlBody
optional_parameters.description: If no TextBody specified HTML email message.

optional_parameters.name: CcRecipientEmailAddress
optional_parameters.description: Cc recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma separated. Max 50.

optional_parameters.name: trackLinks
optional_parameters.description: Activate link tracking for links in the HTML or Text bodies of this email.

optional_parameters.name: trackOpens
optional_parameters.description: Activate open tracking for this email.

optional_parameters.name: headers
optional_parameters.description: List of custom headers to include.

optional_parameters.name: attachments
optional_parameters.description: List of attachments

api_list.name: sendEmailWithTemplate

required_parameters.name: templateModel
required_parameters.description: The model to be applied to the specified template to generate HtmlBody, TextBody, and Subject.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: The sender email address. Must have a registered and confirmed Sender Signature.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma separated. Max 50.

required_parameters.name: templateId
required_parameters.description: The template to use when sending this message.

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: Email tag that allows you to categorize outgoing emails and get detailed statistics.

optional_parameters.name: CcRecipientEmailAddress
optional_parameters.description: Cc recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma separated. Max 50.

optional_parameters.name: inlineCss
optional_parameters.description: By default, if the specified template contains an HTMLBody, we will apply the style blocks as inline attributes to the rendered HTML content. You may opt-out of this behavior by passing false for this request field.

optional_parameters.name: BccRecipientEmailAddress
optional_parameters.description: Bcc recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma separated. Max 50.

optional_parameters.name: trackLinks
optional_parameters.description: Activate link tracking for links in the HTML or Text bodies of this email.

optional_parameters.name: replyTo
optional_parameters.description: Reply To override email address. Defaults to the Reply To set in the sender signature.

optional_parameters.name: trackOpens
optional_parameters.description: Activate open tracking for this email.

optional_parameters.name: headers
optional_parameters.description: List of custom headers to include.

optional_parameters.name: attachments
optional_parameters.description: List of attachments

required_parameters.name: accountToken

required_parameters.name: returnPathDomain

api_list.name: updateServer

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

optional_parameters.name: clickHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to when a unique click event occurs.

optional_parameters.name: openHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time an open event occurs.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of server.

optional_parameters.name: inboundSpamThreshold
optional_parameters.description: The maximum spam score for an inbound message before it's blocked.

optional_parameters.name: trackOpens
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if all emails being sent through this server have open tracking enabled.

optional_parameters.name: smtpApiActivated
optional_parameters.description: Specifies whether or not SMTP is enabled on this server.

optional_parameters.name: deliveryHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time email is delivered.

optional_parameters.name: bounceHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time a bounce event occurs.

optional_parameters.name: inboundHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time an inbound event occurs.

optional_parameters.name: includeBounceContentInHook
optional_parameters.description: Include bounce content in webhook.

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: Color of the server in the rack screen.

optional_parameters.name: trackLinks
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if all emails being sent through this server should have link tracking enabled for links in their HTML or Text bodies.

optional_parameters.name: inboundDomain
optional_parameters.description: Inbound domain for MX setup.

optional_parameters.name: rawEmailEnabled
optional_parameters.description: Enable raw email to be sent with inbound.

optional_parameters.name: postFirstOpenOnly
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, only the first open by a particular recipient will initiate the open webhook. Any subsequent opens of the same email by the same recipient will not initiate the webhook.

optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time a bounce event occurs.

optional_parameters.description: The maximum spam score for an inbound message before it's blocked.

optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to when a unique click event occurs.

optional_parameters.description: Name of server.

optional_parameters.name: trackOpens
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if all emails being sent through this server have open tracking enabled.

optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time an open event occurs.

optional_parameters.name: deliveryHookUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to POST to every time email is delivered.

optional_parameters.name: trackLinks
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if all emails being sent through this server should have link tracking enabled for links in their HTML or Text bodies.

api_list.name: updateSignature

required_parameters.name: accountToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires account level privileges. Only accessible by the account owner, this token can be found on the Account tab of your Postmark account.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: From name associated with sender signature.

required_parameters.name: signatureId
required_parameters.description: Id of the signature.

optional_parameters.name: returnPathDomain
optional_parameters.description: A custom value for the Return-Path domain. It is an optional field, but it must be a subdomain of your From Email domain and must have a CNAME record that points to pm.mtasv.net. For more information about this field, please see readme.

optional_parameters.name: replyToEmail
optional_parameters.description: Override for reply-to address.

api_list.name: updateTemplate

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of template.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: subject
required_parameters.description: The content to use for the Subject when this template is used to send email. See readme for more information.

required_parameters.name: templateId
required_parameters.description: ID of template.

optional_parameters.name: textBody
optional_parameters.description: The content to use for the HtmlBody when this template is used to send email. Required if htmlBody is not specified. See readme for more information.

optional_parameters.name: htmlBody
optional_parameters.description: The content to use for the TextBody when this template is used to send email. Required if textBody is not specified.  See readme for more information.

api_list.name: updateTrigger

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: triggerId
required_parameters.description: Id of the trigger.

required_parameters.name: matchName
required_parameters.description: Name of the tag that will activate this trigger.

optional_parameters.name: trackOpens
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if this trigger activates open tracking.

api_list.name: validateTemplate

required_parameters.name: subject
required_parameters.description: The content to use for the Subject when this template is used to send email. See readme for more information.

required_parameters.name: serverToken
required_parameters.description: This request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of template.

optional_parameters.name: inlineCssForHtmlTestRender
optional_parameters.description: When HtmlBody is specified, the test render will have style blocks inlined as style attributes on matching html elements. You may disable the css inlining behavior by passing false for this parameter.

optional_parameters.name: htmlBody
optional_parameters.description: The content to use for the TextBody when this template is used to send email. Required if textBody is not specified.  See readme for more information.

optional_parameters.name: testRenderModel
optional_parameters.description: The model to be used when rendering test content.See more in readme.

optional_parameters.name: textBody
optional_parameters.description: The content to use for the HtmlBody when this template is used to send email. Required if htmlBody is not specified. See readme for more information.

api_list.name: webhookEvent
api_list.description: A webhook is the act of Postmark making an HTTP POST request to your application’s API when an event occurs. This way Postmark is able to immediately notify you when an event occurs and your application doesn’t have to perform complicated polling of Postmark’s API to determine if something new occurred.

optional_parameters.name: serverToken
optional_parameters.description: Your serverToken.
